title: metis and parmetis cannot be built
body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install metis
```

cannot find the source.
Trying to reproduce this by manually attempting to download:

### Error Message

```console
$ wget http://glaros.dtc.umn.edu/gkhome/fetch/sw/metis/metis-5.1.0.tar.gz
--2019-11-08 13:06:53--  http://glaros.dtc.umn.edu/gkhome/fetch/sw/metis/metis-5.1.0.tar.gz
Resolving glaros.dtc.umn.edu (glaros.dtc.umn.edu)... failed: Name or service not known.
wget: unable to resolve host address ‘glaros.dtc.umn.edu’
```
### Information on your system

CentOS7, fresh SPACK checkout 

### Mitigation

for metis:
```
--- package.py.ORIG     2019-11-06 15:00:00.000000000 +0100
+++ package.py  2019-11-07 15:50:27.000000000 +0100
@@ -21,7 +21,9 @@
     url      = "http://glaros.dtc.umn.edu/gkhome/fetch/sw/metis/metis-5.1.0.tar.gz"
     list_url = "http://glaros.dtc.umn.edu/gkhome/fsroot/sw/metis/OLD"
 
-    version('5.1.0', sha256='76faebe03f6c963127dbb73c13eab58c9a3faeae48779f049066a21c087c5db2')
+#    version('5.1.0', sha256='76faebe03f6c963127dbb73c13eab58c9a3faeae48779f049066a21c087c5db2')
+    version('5.1.0', sha256='76faebe03f6c963127dbb73c13eab58c9a3faeae48779f049066a21c087c5db2',
+           url='https://github.com/scivision/METIS/raw/master/metis-5.1.0.tar.gz')
     version('5.0.2', sha256='f79790676ca2ce3dfa9d5e2d74801e91d92415664ede2c2fc18fc49d4a161981')
     version('4.0.3', sha256='5efa35de80703c1b2c4d0de080fafbcf4e0d363a21149a1ad2f96e0144841a55')
```

for parmetis:
```

-    version('4.0.3', sha256='f2d9a231b7cf97f1fee6e8c9663113ebf6c240d407d3c118c55b3633d6be6e5f')

+           url='http://deb.debian.org/debian/pool/non-free/p/parmetis/parmetis_4.0.3.orig.tar.gz')
```
